SENT.plain: We describe a male infant with unusual facial appearance, relative pancytopenia, bilateral simian creases, and an accessory nipple
Cytogenetic analysis showed deletion of the long arm of chromosome 11 [46,XY,del(11)(pter-->q23.2:)]
Bone-marrow study showed a myelodysplastic change of hemopoietic cells compatible with peripheral blood findings
Pachygyria of the temporal and frontal lobes was demonstrated by magnetic resonance image (MRI) of the brain
We present our findings in order to contribute to the information on 11q23 deletion
